name: Create FreshBooks items from new rows in Google Sheets
description: Every time a new row in Google Sheets is created, Make will create a FreshBooks item out of it. To make sure the scenario works fine check if your spreadsheet corresponds to this (example)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fqP7BHOumfCaxcPdD0KxM4i20UvYMTylQJyKzsDL1DM/edit?usp=sharing].
